    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       International Political Economy &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

     </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17116869">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116869">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116869">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference and Statistical Materials
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116869">
          <p>
           <em>
            Europa world year book
           </em>
           (Taylor and Francis)
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://0-www.europaworld.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Online
           </a>
           or search library catalog by title
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            International financial statistics yearbook
           </i>
           (International Monetary Fund)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 332 I61f
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            International financial statistics: Country notes
           </i>
           (International Monetary Fund)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 332 I61fc
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Statistical yearbook
           </em>
           (United Nations)
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/syb/default.htm">
            Online
           </a>
           or search library catalog by title
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Statistical yearbook for Asia and the Pacific
           </em>
           (United Nations)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 315 S797y
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            United Nations data
           </em>
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://data.un.org/">
            Online
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            World Bank data
           </em>
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://data.worldbank.org/">
            Online
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            World development indicators
           </i>
           (World Bank)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 330.91 W927d
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17116869" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116872">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116872">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116872">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles: Indexes and Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116872">
          <p>
           <em>
            <strong>
             CURRENT EVENTS / NEWS
            </strong>
           </em>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706364" href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank">
              LexisNexis Academic
              <br />
             </a>
             A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts from around the world, including Bangladesh.&nbsp; Full text is linked directly in the database
            </p>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706409" href="http://www.mondotimes.com/1/world/bd" target="_blank">
              Mondo Times -- the Worldwide News Media Guide, Bangladesh
             </a>
             <br />
             Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.&nbsp;&nbsp;
            </p>
           </blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <em>
            <strong>
             SCHOLARLY
            </strong>
           </em>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Subject-Specific Databases: Political Science
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a href="http://0-www.ciaonet.org.library.muhlenberg.edu/">
              Columbia International Affairs Online (CIAO)
             </a>
             <br />
             A database of scholarly journal articles, working papers, policy briefs, conference proceedings, and more in the area of international affairs theory and research. Full text is linked directly in the database.
            </p>
            <p>
             <a href="http://0-search.proquest.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/pais/ip?accountid=40980">
              PAIS
             </a>
             <br />
             Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues. Use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             <span>
              &nbsp;buttons
             </span>
             &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </p>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12810727" href="http://0-search.proquest.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank">
              Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
             </a>
             <br />
             Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy. Use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             <span>
              &nbsp;buttons
             </span>
             &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </p>
           </blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Subject-Specific Databases: Related Disciplines
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706322" href="http://0-search.proquest.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/econlitshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank">
              EconLit
             </a>
             <br />
             Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, working papers, conference papers, and more in economics. Especially useful for research on a country's economic policies, development issues, and trade. Use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             <span>
              &nbsp;buttons
             </span>
             &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </p>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12811735" href="http://0-search.proquest.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/socabsshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank">
              Sociological Abstracts
              <br />
             </a>
             Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Relevant subjects covered: community development, culture and social structure, demography and human biology, environmental interactions, family and social welfare, and women's studies. Use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             <span>
              &nbsp;buttons
             </span>
             &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </p>
           </blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Interdisciplinary Databases
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706308" href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph" target="_blank">
              Academic Search Complete
             </a>
             <br />
             A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including political science. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             <span>
              &nbsp;buttons
             </span>
             &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </p>
           </blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt10719765" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <blockquote>
             <blockquote>
              <p id="link_13011281" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery" target="_blank">
               <a id="link_13011281" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discovery" target="_blank">
                Encompass Search
                <br />
               </a>
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books, scholarly journals, newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more. Rather than searching in separate databases, Encompass Search helps you find resources from many catalogs and databases quickly and easily, all from a single search box.&nbsp; To find only articles, use the Article limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Use the Peer-reviewed limit to narrow further to scholarly sources that have been peer-reviewed. Some full text is linked directly; otherwise, use the
               <strong>
                Check for Full Text
               </strong>
               <span>
                &nbsp;buttons
               </span>
               &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
              </p>
             </blockquote>
            </blockquote>
           </div>
          </div>
          <blockquote>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706350" href="http://0-www.jstor.org.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank">
              JSTOR
              <br />
             </a>
             A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
            </p>
            <p>
             <a id="link_12706354" href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank">
              Omnifile
             </a>
             <br />
             A
             <span class="linkdesc">
              database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
              <strong>
               Check for Full Text
              </strong>
              <span>
               &nbsp;buttons
              </span>
              &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library
             </span>
             .
            </p>
           </blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <blockquote align="center" noshade="noshade" size="1" width="45%">
           </blockquote>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17116872" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469228">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469228">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469228">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116873">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116873">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116873">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Books: NGOs and Bangladesh
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116873">
          <p>
           <em>
            Bangladesh : promise and performance
           </em>
           (Jahan)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection 954.9205 B216p
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            Civil society by design: donors, NGOs, and the intermestic development circle in Bangladesh
           </i>
           (Stiles)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection 306.095492 S856c
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Country report. Bangladesh
           </em>
           (Economist Intelligence Unit)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 330.95492 C855r (MOST RECENT EDITION ON RESERVE)
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Freedom from want: The remarkable success story of BRAC, the global grassroots organization that's winning the fight against poverty
           </em>
           (Smillie)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection 362.557 S641f
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Global corruption report
           </em>
           . (Transparency International)
           <br />
           Location:
           <a href="http://bibpurl.oclc.org/web/5476">
            Online
           </a>
           or search library catalog by title or 324.66 G562c for print
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            Supporting citizens' initiatives: Bangladesh's NGOs and society
           </i>
           (Holloway)
           <br />
           Location: Main Collection 306.095492 H745s
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17116873" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116875">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116875">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116875">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116875">
          <p>
           <strong>
            THINK TANKS, INSTITUTES, AND PRESSURE GROUPS
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Association for Economic and Development Studies on Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.aedsb.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.aedsb.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Center for Advanced Studies:
            <a href="http://www.bcas.net/" target="_blank">
             http://www.bcas.net/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Human Rights Network:
            <a href="http://www.banglarights.net/" target="_blank">
             http://www.banglarights.net/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Institute for Development Studies:
            <a href="http://www.bids-bd.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.bids-bd.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Center for Policy Dialogue, Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://cpd.org.bd/">
             http://cpd.org.bd/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Odhikar (Bangladeshi Human Rights Group):
            <a href="http://www.odhikar.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.odhikar.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Transparency International: Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.ti-bangladesh.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.ti-bangladesh.org/
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            UNITED NATIONS
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            United Nations: Permanent Mission of Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.un.int/bangladesh/" target="_blank">
             http://www.un.int/bangladesh/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF):
            <a href="http://www.unicef.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.unicef.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <ul>
            <li>
             UNICEF: Bangladesh:
             <a href="http://www.unicef.org/infobycountry/bangladesh.html" target="_blank">
              http://www.unicef.org/infobycountry/bangladesh.html
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <li>
            United Nations Development Programme (UNDP):
            <a href="http://www.undp.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.undp.org/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              UNDP: Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.undp.org.bd/" target="_blank">
               http://www.undp.org.bd/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP):
            <a href="http://www.unescap.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.unescap.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO):
            <a href="http://www.fao.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.fao.org/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              FAO: Bangladesh Projects:
              <a href="http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/index.asp?iso3=BGD&amp;x=5&amp;y=4" target="_blank">
               http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/index.asp?iso3=BGD&amp;x=5&amp;y=4
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            World Food Programme (WFP):
            <a href="http://www.wfp.org" target="_blank">
             http://www.wfp.org
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              WFP: Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.wfp.org/countries/bangladesh" target="_blank">
               http://www.wfp.org/countries/bangladesh
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            World Health Organization (WHO):
            <a href="http://www.who.int/" target="_blank">
             http://www.who.int/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              WHO: Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.who.int/country/bgd/en/" target="_blank">
               http://www.who.int/country/bgd/en/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            IMF / WORLD BANK / ADB
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            International Monetary Fund (IMF): Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.imf.org/external/country/BGD/index.htm" target="_blank">
             http://www.imf.org/external/country/BGD/index.htm
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            World Bank:
            <a href="http://www.worldbank.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.worldbank.org/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              World Bank: Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.worldbank.org/bd" target="_blank">
               http://www.worldbank.org/bd
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Development Forum:
            <a href="http://www.erd.gov.bd/BDF-2010/index.php">
             http://www.erd.gov.bd/BDF-2010/index.php
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Asian Development Bank: Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.adb.org/Bangladesh/default.asp" target="_blank">
             http://www.adb.org/Bangladesh/default.asp
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            DONOR COUNTRIES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Australian Aid (AusAID):
            <a href="http://www.ausaid.gov.au/" target="_blank">
             http://www.ausaid.gov.au/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              AusAID, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.ausaid.gov.au/countries/southasia/bangladesh/Pages/home.aspx" target="_blank">
               http://www.ausaid.gov.au/countries/southasia/bangladesh/Pages/home.aspx
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            British Development Agency (DIFD):
            <a href="http://www.dfid.gov.uk" target="_blank">
             http://www.dfid.gov.uk
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              DFID, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.dfid.gov.uk/where-we-work/asia-south/bangladesh/">
               http://www.dfid.gov.uk/where-we-work/asia-south/bangladesh/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA):
            <a href="http://www.acdi-cida.gc.ca/" target="_blank">
             http://www.acdi-cida.gc.ca/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              CIDA, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.acdi-cida.gc.ca/bangladesh-e" target="_blank">
               http://www.acdi-cida.gc.ca/bangladesh-e
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            European Union, Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://eeas.europa.eu/delegations/bangladesh/eu_bangladesh/political_relations/index_en.htm">
             http://eeas.europa.eu/delegations/bangladesh/eu_bangladesh/political_relations/index_en.htm
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            German Development Agency (GTZ):
            <a href="http://www.gtz.de/en/" target="_blank">
             http://www.gtz.de/en/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              GTZ, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.giz.de/en/worldwide/351.html">
               http://www.giz.de/en/worldwide/351.html
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA):
            <a href="http://www.jica.go.jp/english/" target="_blank">
             http://www.jica.go.jp/english/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              JICA, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.jica.go.jp/bangladesh/english/index.html" target="_blank">
               http://www.jica.go.jp/bangladesh/english/index.html
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Norwegian Agency for Development Cooperation (NORAD):
            <a href="http://www.norad.no/en/front-page">
             http://www.norad.no/en/front-page
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              NORAD, Bangladesh:&nbsp;
              <a href="http://www.norad.no/en/countries/asia-and-oceania/bangladesh">
               http://www.norad.no/en/countries/asia-and-oceania/bangladesh
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (SIDA):
            <a href="http://www.sida.se/English/">
             http://www.sida.se/English/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              SIDA, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.sida.se/English/Countries-and-regions/Asia/Bangladesh/">
               http://www.sida.se/English/Countries-and-regions/Asia/Bangladesh/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            UNITED STATES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            USAID:
            <a href="http://www.usaid.gov/">
             http://www.usaid.gov/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Mission to Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://transition.usaid.gov/bd/" target="_blank">
               http://transition.usaid.gov/bd/
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            US Embassy in Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://dhaka.usembassy.gov/" target="_blank">
             http://dhaka.usembassy.gov/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            US State Department: Background Note: Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn/3452.htm" target="_blank">
             http://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn/3452.htm
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            BANGLADESH GOVERNMENT
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Government, Official Page:
            <a href="http://www.bangladesh.gov.bd/" target="_blank">
             http://www.bangladesh.gov.bd/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Ministries and Divisions:
              <a href="http://www.bangladesh.gov.bd/index.php?option=com_weblinks&amp;task=ministry&amp;Itemid=152">
               http://www.bangladesh.gov.bd/index.php?option=com_weblinks&amp;task=ministry&amp;Itemid=152
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              Implementation Monitoring and Evaluation Division, Ministry of Planning:
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//guides/libinst/polisci/ipe.html">
               http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//guides/libinst/polisci/ipe.html
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Parliament of Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.parliament.gov.bd/indexeng.html">
             http://www.parliament.gov.bd/indexeng.html
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Bureau of Educational Statistics:
            <a href="http://www.banbeis.gov.bd/" target="_blank">
             http://www.banbeis.gov.bd/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Bank (Central Bank):
            <a href="http://www.bangladesh-bank.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.bangladesh-bank.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Board of Investment, Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://boi.gov.bd/">
             http://boi.gov.bd/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            National Board of Revenue, Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.nbr-bd.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.nbr-bd.org/
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            NGOs
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <em>
             Southern NGOs
            </em>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            ASA Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://asa.org.bd/" target="_blank">
             http://asa.org.bd/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Bangladesh Rural Advancement Committee:
            <a href="http://www.brac.net/" target="_blank">
             http://www.brac.net/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Grameen Bank:
            <a href="http://www.grameen-info.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.grameen-info.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Proshika:
            <a href="http://www.proshika.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.proshika.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            The Sustainable Development Networking Program (SDNP):
            <a href="http://www.sdnbd.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.sdnbd.org/
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            <em>
             Northern NGOs
            </em>
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Oxfam:
            <a href="http://www.oxfam.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.oxfam.org/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Oxfam, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.oxfam.org.uk/what-we-do/countries-we-work-in/bangladesh">
               http://www.oxfam.org.uk/what-we-do/countries-we-work-in/bangladesh
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC):
            <a href="http://www.icrc.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.icrc.org/
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            Save the Children:
            <a href="http://www.savethechildren.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.savethechildren.org/
            </a>
            <ul>
             <li>
              Save the Children, Bangladesh:
              <a href="http://www.savethechildren.org/site/c.8rKLIXMGIpI4E/b.6150521/k.1450/Bangladesh.htm" target="_blank">
               http://www.savethechildren.org/site/c.8rKLIXMGIpI4E/b.6150521/k.1450/Bangladesh.htm
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
           <li>
            Transparency International, Bangladesh:
            <a href="http://www.ti-bangladesh.org/" target="_blank">
             http://www.ti-bangladesh.org/
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17116875" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469233">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469233">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469233">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18460062">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            For help using
            <strong>
             Chicago style
            </strong>
            , consult the following resources::
           </li>
          </ul>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             <em>
              The Chicago manual of style
             </em>
             (16th ed., 2010)
             <br />
             Location:
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
              Online
             </a>
             or search Encompass Search by title or Ready Reference 808.027 C632m
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Manual of Style (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
             <br />
             <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
              http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Style (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
             <br />
             <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf">
              http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago/Turabian Documentation Style (Writing Center, University of Wisconsin--Madison)
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html" target="_blank">
              http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18460062" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652211" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18469201">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469201">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469201">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
